verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_2: Taught the Quran to His beloved.
verse.verse_3: He created Muhammad, the soul of humanity.
verse.verse_4: He taught him speech regarding whatever had already happened and whatever will happen.
verse.verse_5: The sun and the moon are according to a reckoning.
verse.verse_6: And the green plants and trees prostrate.
verse.verse_7: And the sky, Allah has elevated it and set the balance.
verse.verse_8: That you may not transgress in the balance.
verse.verse_9: And keep up the weight with justice, and shorten not the weight.
verse.verse_10: And the earth, He has laid for the creatures.
verse.verse_11: Therein are fruits and palm trees with sheaths.
verse.verse_12: And grain with husk and fragrant flowers.
verse.verse_13: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will O jinn and men you twain deny?
verse.verse_14: He made man from ringing clay, it is like a potsherd.
verse.verse_15: And the Jinn He created from the flame of the fire.
verse.verse_16: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you twain deny?
verse.verse_17: He is the Lord of the two easts and the two wests.
verse.verse_18: Which, then, of favors of your Lord will you twain deny?
verse.verse_19: He made flow two seas that look to be joined.
verse.verse_20: And there is a barrier in between them that one cannot excel the other.
verse.verse_21: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you twain deny?
verse.verse_22: There comes out from them pearl and the Coral.
verse.verse_23: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_24: His are the carriers that they are raised up in the sea like mountains.
verse.verse_25: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_26: All- that is on earth is to perish.
verse.verse_27: And there is abiding forever is the Entity of your Lord Majestic and Venerable.
verse.verse_28: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_29: To Him beg all that are in the heavens and in the earth. Every day He has work.
verse.verse_30: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_31: Soon after finishing all works We proceed to your reckoning. O you two heavy groups.
verse.verse_32: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_33: O company of Jinn and men, if you can that you may go out of the boundaries of the heavens and the earth then do go. Wherever you will go, His is the Kingdom.
verse.verse_34: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_35: On you shall be loosed the flame of the fire without smoke and black smoke without flame, then you could not be able to take revenge.
verse.verse_36: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_37: And when the sky will split it will become rose-like red hide.
verse.verse_38: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_39: Then on that day the sinner shall not be asked about his sin, neither man nor Jinn.
verse.verse_40: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_41: The culprits shall be recognized by their faces and after being seized by the forelocks and feet will be cast in the hell.
verse.verse_42: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_43: This is the Hell which the culprits belie.
verse.verse_44: They will go round between it and fierce boiling water.
verse.verse_45: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_46: But for him who fears to stand before his Lord there are two paradises.
verse.verse_47: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_49: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_51: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_52: In them are two kinds of each fruit.
verse.verse_53: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_54: Reclining on beds whose linings are of brocades and the fruit of both so low that you may pick up with your hands.
verse.verse_55: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_56: On the beds there are the maidens that they glance towards none save their husbands untouched before them by any man or Jinn.
verse.verse_57: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny? '
verse.verse_58: As if they are rubies and corals.
verse.verse_59: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_60: What is the recompense of goodness, but goodness?
verse.verse_61: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_62: And besides them, there are two other gardens.
verse.verse_63: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_64: From deep green, giving black reflection.
verse.verse_65: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_66: In them there are two springs gushing forth.
verse.verse_67: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_68: In them there are fruits dates and pomegranates.
verse.verse_69: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_70: In them there are maidens good natured, beautiful.
verse.verse_71: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_72: There are houris, confined in tents.
verse.verse_73: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_74: Neither man nor jinn have touched them before.
verse.verse_75: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_76: Reclining on green beds and painted lovely carpets.
verse.verse_77: Which, then, of the favors of your Lord will you deny?
verse.verse_78: Greatly Blessed is the name of your Lord, Majestic and Venerable.
